log.speaker: Assistant
log.text:
Hello! How can I help you today?

You can ask me a question, have me write something for you, help you brainstorm ideas, or anything else you can think of.

Just let me know what's on your mind

log.speaker: Persuadee
log.text:
Hi. I'm a bit worried. My doctor just prescribed a new medication for me, and I was reading the pamphlet... it lists a ton of possible side effects. It's making me really anxious to even start it.

I've heard that a lot of the time, these things are just psychosomatic, right? Like, if you expect to feel sick, you will. I'm hoping it's mostly just in my head.
